cotton.services

Class ServiceMetaData

  • java.lang.Object
    • cotton.services.ServiceMetaData

  • public class ServiceMetaData
extends java.lang.Object
    The ServiceMetaData consists of information about the service. The ServiceHandler needs to manually update the thread count for the currentThreadCount to work.
    See Also:
    ServiceHandler

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServiceMetaData(ServiceFactory serviceFactory, int maxCapacity)
      Constructs a object with information about the service.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int decrementThreadCount()
      Decrements the number keeping track of running instances.
      int getCurrentThreadCount()
      Returns the current amount of instances running in the thread pool.
      int getMaxCapacity()
      Returns the maximum amount of instances that are allowed to run simultaneously.
      ServiceFactory getServiceFactory()
      Returns the ServiceFactory connected to the service.
      int incrementThreadCount()
      Increments the number keeping track of running instances.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServiceMetaData

        public ServiceMetaData(ServiceFactory serviceFactory,
                       int maxCapacity)
        Constructs a object with information about the service. The thread count will start at zero.
        Parameters:
        serviceFactory - the ServiceFactory for the service.
        maxCapacity - defines the maximum amount of simultaneously services.

    • Method Detail

      • incrementThreadCount

        public int incrementThreadCount()
        Increments the number keeping track of running instances. This function should be executed when a new thread is launched.
        Returns:
        the number of instances running.

      • decrementThreadCount

        public int decrementThreadCount()
        Decrements the number keeping track of running instances. This function should be executed when a thread is turned off.
        Returns:
        the number of instances running.

      • getMaxCapacity

        public int getMaxCapacity()
        Returns the maximum amount of instances that are allowed to run simultaneously.
        Returns:
        maximum capacity of the service.

      • getCurrentThreadCount

        public int getCurrentThreadCount()
        Returns the current amount of instances running in the thread pool.
        Returns:
        current amount of instances.

      • getServiceFactory

        public ServiceFactory getServiceFactory()
        Returns the ServiceFactory connected to the service.
        Returns:
        the ServiceFactory connected to the service.
